overview:
Katy Turner is head of marketing at Videoplaza, the global advertising tech provider. Videoplaza are focused on the video advertising space, and deliver video advertising across multiple platforms, enablng the new TV.

Prior to Videoplaza, Katy was an associate at Eden Ventures, one of Europe’s leading early stage software venture houses. Whilst at Eden Katy focused on b2b opportunities including SaaS; mobile; storage and virtualization; enterprise software; gaming and virtual worlds.

She joined the Eden team from Orange, where she worked for 8 years in a variety of national and international marketing roles, from product development through to product marketing, product management and segment strategy.
